code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL="http://127.0.0.1:8003/v1/api/produtos";export const fetchProducts=async()=>{return await axios.get(`${API_URL}/listar_todos`);};export const createProduct=async product=>{return await axios.post(`${API_URL}/criar`,product);};export const updateProduct=async(id,product)=>{return await axios.put(`${API_URL}/update/${id}`,product);};export const deleteProduct=async id=>{return await axios.delete(`${API_URL}/delete/${id}`);};export const aumentarCaixas=async(id,quantidade)=>{return await axios.put(`${API_URL}/aumentar_caixas/${id}?quantidade=1`);};export const diminuirCaixas=async(id,quantidade)=>{return await axios.put(`${API_URL}/diminuir_caixas/${id}?quantidade=1`);};
